project_name.justification: The primary project of interest is stated in the title: 'Myriad Uranium Enters into Option to Acquire 100% of the Red Basin Uranium Project in New Mexico, USA'.

company_name.justification: The acquiring company (Buyer) is identified at the beginning of the press release: 'Myriad Uranium Corp. (CSE: M) (OTCQB: MYRUF) (FSE: C3Q) ("Myriad " or the "Company") is pleased to announce that it has entered into a property option agreement...'

ceo_buyer.justification: The CEO of the acquiring company, Myriad Uranium Corp., is identified in the text: 'Myriad's CEO Thomas Lamb commented...'

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The agreement gives Myriad the option to acquire a full interest: '...pursuant to which Myriad has the option (the "Option") to earn a 100% interest in and to the First American Red Basin Uranium Project...'

primary_commodity.justification: The project is explicitly identified as a uranium project in the title: 'Myriad Uranium Enters into Option to Acquire 100% of the Red Basin Uranium Project in New Mexico, USA'.

verified_article_link.justification: The article is confirmed to be about the Red Basin project as stated in the title: 'Myriad Uranium Enters into Option to Acquire 100% of the Red Basin Uranium Project in New Mexico, USA'.

currency.justification: The currency is specified as Canadian dollars (C$): '...consideration is comprised of cash and share payments aggregating C$525,000...'

cash_payments_raw.justification: The total cash payment is the sum of a deposit and an additional payment: 'Having already paid the Optionor a C$25,000 non-refundable deposit, to exercise the Option, Myriad must make an additional cash payment of C$250,000 to the Optionor...' (25,000 + 250,000 = 275,000).

share_payments_raw.justification: The value of the shares issued as part of the consideration is explicitly stated: '...issue the Optionor 612,164 common shares of Myriad (each, a "Share") at a deemed price of approximately C$0.408 per Share, representing a value of C$250,000...'

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: Null because separate cash and share payment values were identified and populated in `cash_payments_raw` and `share_payments_raw` as per the mutually exclusive financial extraction hierarchy.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: Null because explicit cash and share payment values were identified. Per the financial extraction hierarchy, `cash_payments_raw` and `share_payments_raw` are populated, and other financial fields are set to null.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No share warrant payments were mentioned in the transaction terms.

option_payments_raw.justification: No option payments, aside from the main transaction consideration, were mentioned.

issued_share_price.justification: Null because explicit cash and share payment values were identified. Per the financial extraction hierarchy, `cash_payments_raw` and `share_payments_raw` are populated, and other financial fields are set to null.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The exploration commitment is a geophysics survey, not a specific length of drilling.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: A monetary value for the required exploration commitment was not specified: 'Myriad's final obligation under the Option is to conduct a geophysics survey of the Project within one year of the Option Agreement...'

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: No Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) or Gross Revenue Royalty (GRR) was mentioned as part of the transaction terms.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The project area is specified in acres: '...comprised of 86 lode claims in the Red Basin area... covering approximately 1,776 acres...'

coverage_area_unit.justification: The unit for the coverage area is specified as acres: '...covering approximately 1,776 acres...'

resource_size.value: 500,000 pounds and an inferred resource between 1.5 - 6.5 million pounds U3O8
resource_size.justification: A historical resource estimate is provided in the text: 'Using a grade times thickness (GT) cutoff of 0.25 and grade cutoff of 0.02%, in-place resources of 500,000 pounds and an inferred resource between 1.5 - 6.5 million pounds U3O8 was estimated (RGR, 2012).'

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer's ticker and exchange are listed with its name: 'Myriad Uranium Corp. (CSE: M) (OTCQB: MYRUF) (FSE: C3Q)...'
